nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,18 @@
+From 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000 Mon Sep 17 00:00:00 2001
+From: Toon Schoenmakers <nighteyes1993@gmail.com>
+Date: Fri, 23 Oct 2020 15:01:44 +0200
+Subject: [PATCH] Don't crash on negative item count for fishing loot
+
+
+diff --git a/src/main/java/net/minecraft/server/EntityFishingHook.java b/src/main/java/net/minecraft/server/EntityFishingHook.java
+index b6cace72ab2f3389408a5e528981fcff3b511180..f056192d513e27716136eaafe23d087e3fe42668 100644
+--- a/src/main/java/net/minecraft/server/EntityFishingHook.java
++++ b/src/main/java/net/minecraft/server/EntityFishingHook.java
+@@ -433,6 +433,7 @@ public class EntityFishingHook extends IProjectile {
+ 
+                 while (iterator.hasNext()) {
+                     ItemStack itemstack1 = (ItemStack) iterator.next();
++                    System.err.println("getCount() = " + itemstack1.getCount());
